replies.body: Can someone remove this?

Removed it just now.

Just want to flag these posts for anyone who might have stumbled upon it - these big bold links are scams. There is no way to get RP through shady Facebook links, especially ones that ask you for personal details like your phone number. NEVER give your personal details to anyone you don't trust.

That's true even if there are other botted accounts saying stuff like 'nice trick' and 'worked instantly'! Stay secure over the holidays fam
Virus/telemarketing
URF is all I need.
This doesn't really help unless we know when. Like, right now it is the 28th of Janurary and I have no idea what I've missed and what is yet to come.

can you please stop selling heroes or skins for little extra 2 riot points!?... Mayby you can sell them for little extra 3 riot points and not 2. I currently have that 1 odd number one's column (3=Three). No matter how i look at it, it's  always going to end up have that 1=one point not being able to be spent. It's so anoying!

https://sites.google.com/site/the0rpcalculator/

this site is a calculator for what you need to do to get to 0 rp

Link --> http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous/uQERzEsh-challenger-ahri-storms-back-into-snowdown

I think it's because Challenger Ahri isn't part of the normal sales, it going to be part of an event sale [like snowdown legacy sales] so it will be on sale when Challenger Nid comes out but it's just not here

IMO High Noon is better. I really like the sounds that PROJECT: Yasuo has (especially the dance/electric flute), but the animations are a little clunky and get boring quickly. Plus High Noon has a gunblade.
